name: Crafted Scriptor - Node + Puppeteer (Bundled)
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends libatk1.0-0t64 libatk-bridge2.0-0t64 libcups2t64 libxkbcommon0 libatspi2.0-0t64 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxfixes3 libxrandr2 libgbm1 libasound2t64 libnss3 libx11-xcb1 libxshmfence1 libgtk-3-0t64 libpango-1.0-0 libpangocairo-1.0-0 ca-certificates fonts-liberation && sudo rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
